name: Rss4mobi
tagline: RSS4.mobi is a service that enables you to read RSS feeds on your kindle without stressful actions.Once you set up,you can receive formatted data as you wish! and you can import the OPML file which export by your Google Reader account.
body:
### Authors and Contributors
In 2013, Li Jiuning (@lijiuning) founded Rss4.mobi.

### Support or Contact
